item.title: Monkey Machine Walkthrough (WriteUp)
item.description: On Sunday, April 5th, there was an event for International Women’s Day. Among other activities, there was a cybersecurity workshop. And well, I kinda sneaked in üòú. The workshop had some requirements like having Kali Linux installed. Luckily, I had my laptop and my phone (yep, Kali on both‚Äîdouble the fun üíÅ‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏è). I was ready! But then I found out we needed a virtual machine too, which a friend later shared with me. So I had to step out of the workshop.
